body: Hope adding flake detection (#11975) can help alleviate this, especially that the servers are updated and restarted daily. GFE restart should be ok though.

`tests.cloud_to_prod:default:javaokhttp:server_streaming` also failed (on jenkins)



failed in (https://grpc-testing.appspot.com/job/gRPC_interop_pull_requests/15758/testReport/junit/(root)/tests/cloud_to_prod_default_javaokhttp_server_streaming/)

```
Gradle is no longer run automatically. Make sure to run
'./gradlew installDist -PskipCodegen=true' or
'./gradlew :grpc-interop-testing:installDist -PskipCodegen=true' after any
changes. -PskipCodegen=true is optional, but requires less setup.
```
